select emp_idx, e.emp_name, d.dept_name, e.emp_ext_no, c.common_type, e.emp_join_date, e.emp_phone, e.emp_email, e.emp_roadAddr, e.emp_detailAddr from employee e inner join department d on d.dept_id = e.dept_id inner join common c on c.common_idx = e.`position` where e.emp_idx = #{param1}
